items.sentence: Tom dog paddled toward the shallow end of the pool.
Tom emailed Mary the pictures he took at her party.
Tom entered the office carrying an armload of mail.
Don\'t think I don\'t appreciate what you\'ve done.
Tom didn\'t have the courage to try doing it again.
Tom didn\'t know what kind of snake had bitten him.
Tom doesn\'t know how to relax and just enjoy life.
That\'s not worth the price they\'re asking for it.
The money we offered them was obviously not enough.
Tom says he\'s gotten used to eating hospital food.
Tom says he\'s having a lot of fun learning French.
Tom says if you don\'t do that, Mary will be angry.
Tom says that he can\'t believe anything Mary says.
Tom says that he doesn\'t know anything about Mary.
What\'s the real reason you don\'t want to do this?
I didn\'t know that you could speak French so well.
Tom definitely doesn\'t want to be class president.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary had just gotten married.
I don\'t want to interrupt Tom while he\'s working.
I wish Tom would give me back the money he owes me.
